az: i dont have everything as a matter of fact i dont have anything except a dream of a better day and you to help me find my way being a man i am sure to make mistakes but to keep you i would do all it takes and if it meant my love was really true id gladly die and watch over you i wish you knew how much i cared youd see my love is true. by the life wed share even if you changed your mind and said our love was thru id want to die continuously cry and still id love you
